data.title: Tesla's China-Made Model Y Threatens Nio's Growing Dominance, Bloomberg Analysts Say
data.text: Chinese electric vehicle manufacturer Nio Inc (NASDAQ: NIO) faces increased competition from Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA), which will only become more intense with the launch of the latter's China-made Model Y vehicle, according to Bloomberg Intelligence analysts. What Happened: The Elon Musk-led company's locally-made compact SUV could give the Nio a run for its money, as per the analysts.

data.title: Latest Developments Show Clear Roadmap To Energy Storage Becoming 50% Of Tesla Revenues
data.text: Latest results show growth of energy storage business. Improved battery production opens up huge revenue opportunities.

data.title: 7 Overvalued Stocks to Drop Before They Drop You
data.text: There are periods when a handful of holdings can become overvalued stocks to sell. Here are seven potential names to watch.

data.title: Tesla reportedly poached Mercedes' Berlin factory chief, and Germany's largest trade union isn't happy about it
data.text: Tesla has poached the chief of Mercedes-Benz's Berlin engine plant, angering members of Germany's largest trade union, according to local media reports.  The electric-vehicle manufacturer hired René Reif, who abruptly left his post as the head of Daimler's Marienfeld factory, German outlet BZ reported Wednesday. The move caused a stir within IG Metall, Germany's metalworkers' union that represents the country's autoworkers, according to the report.

data.text: Tesla (TSLA) stock may have completed the final wave of a classic symmetrical triangle pattern.
